Thin, very very think, but not breathable. It's made of polyester and smelt like burnt plastic when I opened the package. After wear a couple time, buttons were close to falling off, definitely not worth the money. Don't waste that kinda money here. It's better to go to Etsy or eBay for something like this. If you want to cosplay this could work temporarily. The strap across the waist is laid so painfully uneven and it's hard to wash and dry it without the worry of it literally melting. I unfortunately missed the return window as I was moving when I received this and didn't unbox it until I was settled. I heavily regret that.
I love this jacket. I wore it 2 days after it arrived and I got compliment after compliment, after compliment. It was well worth my money!

Arrived with fold marks and no care instructions. According to the listing you can't really wash it and you absolutely cannot put it in a washing machine. So we need to figure out how to get the wrinkles and fold marks out of it. BUT the MOST annoying part is that there are NO BUTTONS holding the tabs down. There are buttons on one side and button holes on that side, so essentially if you unbutton it, the entire tab comes off. From the pictures it shows that there are supposed to be buttons on both sides. So now we have to either sew down the parts that are unsewn OR relace ALL of the buttons. My daughter is in tears as she was supposed to wear this to a Halloween party tomorrow. There is no time to return this and get another one. So very disappointed.
Cute but runs big. Needs to be dry cleaned. Has a bed smell coming out of package.

Honestly, pretty good quality for the price, but I would say it is a bit "costume-y". I'd say size runs pretty true, I normally wear a small but got a medium just in case, overall it fits well but is a tiny bit big, which I'll fix by adding a corset back :)
I got this first my gf, she is 5'4 and we measured her. turns out the sleeves are really tight. Get a size up just in case you face thus issue
Purchased for Halloween. Very lightweight. I’m 5’2”, 150, DD cup - fit is correct and flattering.

My daughter picked this a black pants for her prom amd it was stunning! It did have a lot of strings to trim off but I would of done that no matter what she wore. 评论概述: Great Spin On A Jacket For Cosplay!
评论详情: I was on an exhaustive search for just the right pieces to bring my "What We Do In The Shadows" character, The Guide, to life for a cosplay. I didn't have a lot of references since most people opt to dress as Nadja, which just made me more determined to pay homage to The Guide! So, I studied what she wore on the show in detail in absence of any other major cosplays of her and the tips that sometimes come with them. I almost had an item custom-made, I was getting that desperate to find something that looked like what she would wear.  It was then that I stumbled upon this great jacket. And I knew the moment I saw it my search was over. It's classic black, as The Guide always wears, but has some different style elements that make it somehow Victorian-Military-Steampunk-AND-Timeless. It can work for so many cosplays and even everyday wear!  I ordered a small and it fit me just fine (5'6", 125lbs, small chested). It's well-made and arrived quickly. I removed one star only because mine was missing the two decorative buttons on each sleeve cuffs. Other than that, though, perfect!

I’m usually a size small but an extra small would’ve fit me better. I recommend one size smaller and be careful with the buttons, still really cute though.

My 12 year old daughter loves this coat. It's made of a heavy material and is warmer than it initially looks. Warm enough for late winter/early Spring in Minnesota, at least. It holds up well in the wash and is durable enough for my daughter's wilderness adventures. I let it line dry, and I haven't seen any issues with the stitching or with the fabric when washed on normal settings with normal detergent. All of the buttons are pretty securely stitched on and the button holes are fully stitched. All in all, this is my daughter's favorite jacket and her favorite xmas gift of 2020.

评论概述: Almost perfect unless you're large or curvy
评论详情: I bought this to wear as a light-weight coat or dress. It's almost perfect; the olive color; the asymetrical hemline and button details; the puff sleeves; the color. I wear a size 16 in most brands, so I ordered the largest size. Unfortunately I can't button it up the chest and I can barely squeeze my upper arms into the sleeves. Since I enjoy sewing I'm going to alter it by adding a vent down the back shoulder area, and extra fabric in the armscye and upper arm areas. If that turns out as well as I think it will, I'll also order this in another color.
Its so thin you can read thru it ... Not what I expected even if it's just for the kids cosplay

评论概述: Not sure it’s worth the price
评论详情: The quality is ok. It’s definitely a light jacket, not a thick, warm coat. The pockets weren’t useable because the openings were stitched so you can only fit about 3 fingers. It definitely runs big too. I’m 4’10 and around 100lbs. I got a small and it’s very big on me. The sleeves are also very wide, so unless you have pretty thick arms, the sleeves will just hang and won’t give you that puffy shoulder look. Not sure it’s worth the price.
I bought this for a Halloween costume. It was pretty much what I expected for that money. It fit ok. I had a hard time getting the creases out of it from shipping.
Liked the coat unfortunately the arms were very tight. The chest area was also tight.

Perfect for my lady plague doctor costume of 2020!  Buttons fell off immediately so I had to resew them.  Cut and design of coat is great.  Thin fabric but I ordered a size up so I could layer underneath.  Despite being a bit of work, it still looked super cool and a great addition to my costume collection.

I LOVE this jacket!  I was committed to a steampunk themed Halloween costume and this jacket did not disappoint!!  I’m fairly tall, 5’9 and 175lbs.  I was really surprised about the length of the sleeve!  Perfect fit!!

I got this jacket to help assist my plague doctor costume. I was shocked about the amount of buttons, so it may take time to button up the whole thing. Two reasons why I give this product 4 stars is 1.) because it did not arrive at the time I expected it to be delivered (luckily I got it in time before Halloween) and 2.) Though I am a thick girl, I wish there were more bigger sizes to choose from since I felt pretty snug wearing the whole outfit with all the buttons together. If you can handle the feeling of snug, and don't mind it being long (if you are petite and have shoes that are somewhat high), then I recommend it! But be prepared if it does not arrive on time.
It fits well overall but I do have to take in a few areas. Makes for a perfect halloween costume jacket

Just as expected and looks fantastic with my Halloween costume

Fit at chest and flares out has nice shiny expensive looking double buttons and slighter short in the front and longer in the back and has like a tuxedo tail. I get so many compliments on this coat, absolutely love it.

This is a costume, it looks like a costume, it feels like a costume, it’s priced to be a costume and it’s a great costume!
